Type.Name: ScrollType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ScrollType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: An enumeration used by ScrolledWindow and Range.

remarks.para: This enumeration is used by and to decide how scrolling behaves.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType End = int32(15)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider to the end of the scrollbar.

remarks.para: Sets the scrollbar's slider to the end of the scrollbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType Jump = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider to the position described in the accompanying float parameter.

remarks.para: The range of values are 0 to 1, with the halfway point being 0.5.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The default setting. Indicates that the scrollbar's slider is not moved.

remarks.para: The default setting. Indicates that the scrollbar's slider is not moved.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType PageBackward = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider back one page increment from its current position.

remarks.para: The value of the step increment is taken from the underlying in the scrollbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType PageDown = int32(9)

Docs.summary: Move the slider a page down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType PageForward = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider forward one page increment from its current position.

remarks.para: The value of the step increment is taken from the underlying in the scrollbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType PageLeft = int32(12)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider back one page increment to the left from its current position.

remarks.para: Sets the scrollbar's slider back one page increment to the left from its current position.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType PageRight = int32(13)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider forward one page increment to the right from its current position.

remarks.para: Sets the scrollbar's slider forward one page increment to the right from its current position.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType PageUp = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Move the slider a page up.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType Start = int32(14)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider to the beginning of the scrollbar.

remarks.para: Sets the scrollbar's slider to the beginning of the scrollbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType StepBackward = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider back one step increment from its current position.

remarks.para: The value of the step increment is taken from the underlying in the scrollbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType StepDown = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Move the scroller a step down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType StepForward = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider forward one step increment from its current position.

remarks.para: The value of the step increment is taken from the underlying in the scrollbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType StepLeft = int32(10)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider back one step increment to the left from its current position.

remarks.para: Sets the scrollbar's slider back one step increment to the left from its current position.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType StepRight = int32(11)

Docs.summary: Sets the scrollbar's slider forward one step increment to the right from its current position.

remarks.para: Sets the scrollbar's slider forward one step increment to the right from its current position.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ScrollType StepUp = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Move the scroller a step up.
